availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John Horatio Chandler (Taylor County, Kentucky, merchant)

body.p: Taylor County, Kentucky, merchant. Taylor County native. Son of John B. Chandler and Mary Ann Smith Chandler. Married to Connie Hord Chandler in Taylor County on April 10, 1862. Merchant in Taylor County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Taylor County, Campbellsville, p. 41.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Taylor County Marriages, p. 180-81.
